description.zh-cn: 中华民国第32任内阁，为赖清德政府的首任内阁。其定调为“行动创新AI内阁”，在第十一届立法院中为少数派政府。
description.en: The 32nd cabinet of the Republic of China and the first cabinet of the Lai Ching-te administration. It is positioned as an 'Action and Innovation AI Cabinet' and operates as a minority government in the 11th Legislative Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 自2024年5月20日起执政的中华民国政府。
description.en: The government of the Republic of China, in office since May 20, 2024.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统，领导赖清德政府。
description.en: President of the Republic of China, leader of the Lai Ching-te administration.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国行政院院长，卓荣泰内阁的领导人。
description.en: Premier of the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China, leader of the Cho Jung-tai cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国行政院副院长。
description.en: Vice Premier of the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 卓荣泰内阁的前任内阁。
description.en: The predecessor cabinet to the Cho Jung-tai cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 此次选举由民主进步党候选人赖清德胜选。
description.en: This election was won by the Democratic Progressive Party candidate Lai Ching-te.

description.zh-cn: 卓荣泰内阁时期的主要反对党之一。
description.en: One of the main opposition parties during the term of the Cho Jung-tai cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 卓荣泰内阁时期的主要反对党之一。
description.en: One of the main opposition parties during the term of the Cho Jung-tai cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 卓荣泰内阁首任交通部部长，后因婚外情丑闻辞职。
description.en: The first Minister of Transportation in the Cho Jung-tai cabinet, who later resigned due to an extramarital affair scandal.

description.zh-cn: 导致时任交通部部长李孟谚请辞的事件。
description.en: An event that led to the resignation of the then-Minister of Transportation, Lee Meng-yen.

description.zh-cn: 卓荣泰内阁首任劳动部部长，后因劳动部公务员霸凌轻生案辞职。
description.en: The first Minister of Labor in the Cho Jung-tai cabinet, who resigned due to a suicide case involving bullying by a ministry official.

nodes.id: 劳动部公务员霸凌轻生案

zh-cn: 劳动部公务员霸凌轻生案

description.zh-cn: 导致时任劳动部部长何佩珊辞职的事件。
description.en: An event that led to the resignation of the then-Minister of Labor, Ho Pei-shan.

description.zh-cn: 卓荣泰内阁首任教育部政务次长，后因性平案泄密辞职。
description.en: The first Political Deputy Minister of Education in the Cho Jung-tai cabinet, who resigned due to leaking information in a gender equity case.

description.zh-cn: 卓荣泰内阁经济部部长。
description.en: Minister of Economic Affairs in the Cho Jung-tai cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 卓荣泰内阁卫生福利部部长。
description.en: Minister of Health and Welfare in the Cho Jung-tai cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 卓荣泰内阁劳动部部长。
description.en: Minister of Labor in the Cho Jung-tai cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 卓荣泰内阁交通部部长。
description.en: Minister of Transportation and Communications in the Cho Jung-tai cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的主要政党之一，卓荣泰内阁的执政党。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China, the ruling party of the Cho Jung-tai cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 卓荣泰内阁是赖清德政府的首任内阁。
description.en: The Cho Jung-tai cabinet is the first cabinet of the Lai Ching-te administration.

description.zh-cn: 随着赖清德政府于2024年5月20日就任，陈建仁内阁结束其看守阶段并正式卸任。
description.en: With the inauguration of the Lai Ching-te administration on May 20, 2024, the Chen Chien-jen cabinet concluded its caretaker period and formally stepped down.

description.zh-cn: 赖清德在2024年中华民国总统选举中获胜，从而得以组建新一届政府。
description.en: Lai Ching-te won the 2024 ROC presidential election, which enabled the formation of a new government administration.

description.zh-cn: 时任候任总统的赖清德于2024年4月10日宣布由卓荣泰出任行政院院长。
description.en: On April 10, 2024, then-President-elect Lai Ching-te announced the appointment of Cho Jung-tai as the Premier of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 根据中华民国宪法，行政院为国家最高行政机关，向总统负责。
description.en: According to the Constitution of the Republic of China, the Executive Yuan is the highest administrative organ of the state and is responsible to the President.

position.en: Vice Premier of the Executive Yuan

description.zh-cn: 作为立法院的反对党，中国国民党对卓荣泰内阁构成政治上的制衡与挑战。
description.en: As an opposition party in the Legislative Yuan, the Kuomintang poses a political check and challenge to the Cho Jung-tai cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 作为立法院的反对党，台湾民众党对卓荣泰内阁构成政治上的制衡与挑战。
description.en: As an opposition party in the Legislative Yuan, the Taiwan People's Party poses a political check and challenge to the Cho Jung-tai cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 李孟谚因婚外情丑闻而于2024年8月19日请辞交通部部长。
description.en: Lee Meng-yen resigned as Minister of Transportation on August 19, 2024, due to a scandal involving an extramarital affair.

relationships.source: 劳动部公务员霸凌轻生案

description.zh-cn: 何佩珊因劳动部公务员霸凌轻生案于2024年11月21日辞去劳动部部长职务。
description.en: Ho Pei-shan resigned from her position as Minister of Labor on November 21, 2024, following a suicide case linked to bullying by a ministry official.

description.zh-cn: 卓荣泰内阁为民主进步党籍总统赖清德所任命，其主要成员也多具该党背景。
description.en: The Cho Jung-tai cabinet was appointed by DPP President Lai Ching-te, and many of its key members have a background in the party.
